mapper.select: SELECT ID, CONTENT FROM common_comments ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT id, title, publish_date, IFNULL(comment_total,'0') comment_total, cmt_num, news_num, auto_sum, shinc_sum FROM sh_article WHERE date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{publishDate},'%Y-%c-%d') ORDER BY publish_date desc
mapper.update: update sh_article set publish_date=#{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment_total=#{comment} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) sum,date_format(adddate,'%Y-%m-%d') cal FROM sh_jnl_article_comment where send_flag='2' group by cal order by cal desc

select date_format(tba.insert_date,'%Y-%m-%d') cal, tba.divisor sum from (SELECT * FROM spider_news.sh_comment_statistic where statistic_type='1' order by insert_date desc) tba group by cal order by cal desc limit 30;

select sum,cal from (SELECT count(*) sum,date_format(adddate,'%Y-%m-%d') cal FROM sh_jnl_article_comment where send_flag='2' group by cal order by cal desc) tba where date_format(cal,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%c-%d')

select divisor sum,date_format(insert_date,'%Y-%m-%d') cal from sh_comment_statistic where statistic_type='1' and date_format(insert_date,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%c-%d') order by insert_date desc limit 1;

select sum,cal from (SELECT count(*) sum,date_format(tb_a.adddate,'%Y-%m-%d') cal FROM sh_jnl_article_comment tb_a inner join sh_article tb_b on tb_a.article_id = tb_b.id where 1 = 1 and send_flag='2' and tb_b.category=#{categoryid} group by cal order by cal desc) tba where date_format(cal,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%c-%d')
select sum(cast(comment_total as unsigned integer) ) sum,curdate() cal from sh_article where publish_date > curdate()
select sum(cast(comment_total as unsigned integer) ) sum, date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') cal from sh_article where date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%c-%d')

select sum(cast(comment_total as unsigned integer) ) sum, date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') cal from sh_article where 1 = 1 and date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%c-%d') and category=#{categoryid}
select sum(cast(comment_total as unsigned integer) ) sum, curdate() cal from sh_article where 1 = 1 and publish_date > curdate() and category=#{categoryid}
select date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') cal, count(*) sum from sh_article where 1 = 1 and date_format(publish_date,'%Y-%c-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%c-%d');
